resources.string: Personality Test
Yes
No
Answer Got 0/20
Yes From you
No from you
1. I dont get depressed easily
2. I plan the next adventure before the current one is finished.
3. I love to take care of people and I am good at it.
4. I tend to trust most people.
5. I am too strict with myself and others.
6. I am uncomfortable when people want an emotional response from me.
7. In most close relationships, I give more than I take.
8. Your happiness and your feelings are your responsibility, not mine.
9. I do not mind taking a risk; I really like to beat the odds.
10. I avoid expressing strong emotions.
11.I am quite unobtrusive and easy to get along with.
12. I get bored more easily than most people; I am always looking for new experiences.
13. People are attracted to me because I impress them
14. I try to get closer to people by being generous with my time and energy.
15. I tend to avoid conflict.
16. I am competitive and ambitious, but I do not think of myself as cut throat
17. Sometimes I have overextended myself in trying to help people.
18. I am a big procrastinator.
19. It is strange but I think that there is something beautiful about sadness.
20. I almost never lose control of myself.
